description: All the data that is presented here is captured by the PromEx Phoenix plugin (https://github.com/akoutmos/prom_ex/blob/master/lib/prom_ex/plugins/phoenix.ex)

panels.description: The Phoenix Endpoint module currently active for config metrics.
panels.title: Server Endpoint

panels.description: The port that the server is listening on.
panels.title: Server Port

panels.description: The URL that the server is configured to be accessed from.
panels.title: Server URL

panels.description: The Apdex score of the app based on a satisfactory response time of 500ms and a tolerable response time of 1000ms. This only takes into account how long Phoenix has been handling the request and only requests that resulted in a 2xx status code. The score is based on the last 24 hours of requests.

targets.expr:
(
  (
    sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="500", status=~"2.."}[24h])) + 
    (sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="1000", status=~"2.."}[24h])) - sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="500", status=~"2.."}[24h]))) / 2
  ) 
  / 
  sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", status=~"2.."}[24h]))
) * 100

panels.title: Apdex Score (Last 24h)

panels.description: A percentage of responses that resulted in 400s or 500s over the past 24 hours.

targets.expr: sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_requests_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status=~"4..|5.."}[24h])) / sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_requests_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[24h])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Error Percentage (Last 24h)

panels.description: The amount of data transferred by Phoenix in a 24 hour rolling window.
panels.title: Data Transferred (Last 24h)

panels.description: The amount of requests received by Phoenix in a 24 hour rolling window.
panels.title: Total Requests Received (Last 24h)

panels.description: The Apdex score of the app based on a satisfactory response time of 500ms and a tolerable response time of 1000ms. This only takes into account how long Phoenix has been handling the request and only requests that resulted in a 2xx status code. The score is based on the previous hour of requests.

targets.expr:
(
  (
    sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="500", status=~"2.."}[1h])) + 
    (sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="1000", status=~"2.."}[1h])) - sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance", le="500", status=~"2.."}[1h]))) / 2
  ) 
  / 
  sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", status=~"2.."}[1h]))
) * 100

panels.title: Apdex Score (Last 1h)

panels.description: A percentage of responses that resulted in 400s or 500s over the past hour.

targets.expr: sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_requests_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status=~"4..|5.."}[1h])) / sum(increase(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_requests_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[1h])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Error Percentage (Last 1h)

panels.description: The amount of data transferred by Phoenix in the past hour.
panels.title: Data Transferred (Last 1h)

panels.description: The amount of requests received by Phoenix in the past hour.
panels.title: Total Requests Received (Last 1h)

panels.description: A heatmap showing the request time spread across all requests (regardless of path).
panels.title: Request Time

panels.description: A heatmap showing the response payload size spread across all requests (regardless of path).
panels.title: Response Payload Size

panels.description: The average request time per path per status code per HTTP method.

targets.expr: sum(irate(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_sum{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) by(path, status) / sum(irate(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_request_duration_milliseconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) by(path, status)

panels.title: Average HTTP Request Time

panels.description: The average response size per path per status code per HTTP method.

targets.expr: sum(irate(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_response_size_bytes_sum{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) by(path, status) / sum(irate(pinchflat_prom_ex_phoenix_http_response_size_bytes_count{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) by(path, status)

panels.title: Average HTTP Response Size

panels.description: Shows the number of requests coming into certain paths and the resulting response codes.
panels.title: Path Requests

panels.description: The aggregate response status of all the requests.
panels.title: Response Status Codes

panels.description: How many channel joins have occurred over time.
panels.title: Channel Join Events

panels.description: A heatmap showing the request time spread across all channel events.
panels.title: Channel Message Handle Time

panels.description: The average response time for a channel message.
panels.title: Average Channel Response Time

panels.description: How many socket connections have occurred over time.
panels.title: Socket Connection Events

panels.description: A heatmap showing the request time spread across all socket connections.
panels.title: Socket Connection Time

panels.description: The average time it connects to establish a socket connection.
panels.title: Average Socket Connection Time

title: Pinchflat - PromEx Phoenix Dashboard
